description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Help the little vampire quench his thirst!  Little Draku's parents have gone on vacation, and they forgot to stock the pantry! It's time to go to town in search of fresh blood... Stay unnoticed, and use your vampiric powers to confuse your enemies, but be wary of the dangerous vampire hunters that watch over the city!
